name: channel
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool youtube_v3_alternative.
Tool description: Get data similar to YouTube Data API v3 from this API. Check latest version: [YT-API](https://rapidapi.com/ytjar/api/yt-api)
API description: Fetches details and videos of a YouTube channel using the RapidAPI YouTube V3 alternative.

is_id.description: The ID of the YouTube channel to fetch details for.

x_cachebypass.description: Cache bypass parameter; must be passed as '1' if used.

token.description: Pagination token for fetching additional results beyond the first page.

sort_by.description: Parameter to sort the channel videos. Available options are 'newest', 'oldest', and 'popular'. Defaults to 'newest'.
